scripts.clean:mobile:android: find ./apps/mobile/android -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.kotlin' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.gradle' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.cxx' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:packages:android: find ./packages -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./packages -name '.kotlin' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./packages -name '.gradle' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./packages -name '.cxx' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
